mapper.select: select straight_join a.projname,a.city,sum(b.imchat) as imchats from default.newhouse_proj_info_external as a join ( select count(im_chat_message_messageid) as imchat,im_chat_message_shopid from dwd.dwd_effect_im_message where logday >= #{startDay} and logday <= #{endDay} and im_chat_message_shopid is not null and im_chat_message_shopid !='' group by im_chat_message_shopid,project_city order by count(im_chat_message_messageid) desc ) as b where a.newcode = b.im_chat_message_shopid group by a.projname,a.city order by imchats desc limit 10
